allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add @Loggable and #log macros with swift-log fallback

- @Loggable member macro generates all logging properties \(os.Logger,
  swift-log Logger, category, subsystem\) without protocol conformance
- #log freestanding expression macro generates version-checked logging
  calls: os.Logger on macOS 11+, swift-log on older versions
- Add LogMessage/LogPrivacy/LogLevel types for IDE autocomplete support
- Add swift-log dependency for pre-macOS 11 fallback
- Disambiguate os.Logger vs Logging.Logger in Loggable protocol
- Fix unqualified min/max calls in Comparable+.swift

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
